YATZY.SumTooltip: The sum of the above scores. You need at least a total of 64 to get the 50 points bonus.
YATZY.ThreeOfAKindTooltip: The sum of three dice rolls with the same value.
YATZY.FourOfAKindTooltip: The sum of four dice rolls with the same value.
YATZY.FullHouseTooltip: Two of a kind as well as three of a kind.
YATZY.StraightSmallTooltip: The digits 1-5 for a flat bonus of 30 points.
YATZY.StraightLargeTooltip: The digits 2-6 for a flat bonus of 40 points.
YATZY.YahtzeeTooltip: Five of a kind for a flat bonus of 50 points.
YATZY.ChanceTooltip: The sum of your current dice rolls.
